actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-157.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain Bureau of Land Management land in the State of Nevada to the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Provides for the conveyance of certain Bureau of Land Management (BLM) land in Nevada to the Nevada Speedway, LLC.

Requires: (1) Nevada Speedway, LLC, to pay to the Secretary of the Interior the appraised value of such land; and (2) any costs of the conveyance to be paid by Nevada Speedway, LLC.
